code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches x 2 weeks. patient is a F falconer aged 21 yrs. o:Height 160 cm, Weight 63.9 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 15 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered RF, Knee XRY.

s:a 22 yo f presents with Body Aches. o:Height 159 cm, Weight 62.4 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered RF, Knee XRY.
